content:
TITLE: Installing Prettier Config via CLI
DESCRIPTION: Command to automatically set up Prettier configuration using the package's CLI tool. Installs dependencies and creates necessary config files.
SOURCE: https://github.com/harshalkatakiya/prettier-config/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npx @harshalkatakiya/prettier-config add
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Prettier Configuration with Tailwind CSS v4
DESCRIPTION: JavaScript configuration file that includes Tailwind CSS v4 support with stylesheet path and custom functions.
SOURCE: https://github.com/harshalkatakiya/prettier-config/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
import baseConfig from '@harshalkatakiya/prettier-config';

export default {
  ...baseConfig,
  plugins: ['prettier-plugin-tailwindcss'],
  tailwindStylesheet: './src/app/globals.css',
  tailwindFunctions: ['cn']
};
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Prettier Configuration with Tailwind CSS v3
DESCRIPTION: JavaScript configuration file that includes Tailwind CSS v3 support with plugin and custom functions.
SOURCE: https://github.com/harshalkatakiya/prettier-config/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
import baseConfig from '@harshalkatakiya/prettier-config';

export default {
  ...baseConfig,
  plugins: ['prettier-plugin-tailwindcss'],
  tailwindConfig: './tailwind.config.js',
  tailwindFunctions: ['cn']
};
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Basic Prettier Configuration Setup
DESCRIPTION: JavaScript configuration file for basic Prettier setup without Tailwind CSS support.
SOURCE: https://github.com/harshalkatakiya/prettier-config/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
import baseConfig from '@harshalkatakiya/prettier-config';

export default { ...baseConfig };
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Manual Installation of Dependencies
DESCRIPTION: NPM command to manually install Prettier and required dependencies including the config package and Tailwind plugin.
SOURCE: https://github.com/harshalkatakiya/prettier-config/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install --save-dev prettier @harshalkatakiya/prettier-config prettier-plugin-tailwindcss
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Package.json Scripts Configuration
DESCRIPTION: JSON configuration for adding Prettier formatting and checking scripts to package.json.
SOURCE: https://github.com/harshalkatakiya/prettier-config/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "scripts": {
    "prettier:check": "prettier -c .",
    "prettier": "prettier -w -u ."
  }
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Prettier Ignore Configuration
DESCRIPTION: Content for .prettierignore file to exclude specific directories from Prettier formatting.
SOURCE: https://github.com/harshalkatakiya/prettier-config/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: text
CODE:
```
node_modules
dist
build
```
